sections.title: Bot - Agno with Gemini
sections.content:
Bot is designed using **agno,** **gemini** and **pinecone**. It communicates through **FastAPI**, and is hosted as a **Docker container** on **Render.com**.
 The FastAPI connection is maintained for easy testing on localhost.

sections.title: Website - Next.js
sections.content: The website is built using **Next.js** and is hosted on **Vercel**.

sections.title: Data Storage - Supabase
sections.content: **Supabase** is used for **storing services and user bookings**. **Realtime data** is stored there, and the **chatbot connects to Supabase** to retrieve these values.

sections.title: Web Search - Serper
sections.content: The **Serper API** is used for web search in case the data in the database is insufficient.
